name: Puri Bagus Lovina

reviews.text: A quiet piece of the north away from the hustle and bustle of ubud and kuta, which are only a couple of hours away if you feel the need to visit. However, I found myself hankering for the peace and quiet of the Puri Bagus after a while. I loved it so much, I'm going back for Easter. The North coast is the warmest part so you'll enjoy the best weather. The staff are really friendly and go out of your way to help you....well they did for me. I recommend booking an appointment in the open air spa and spending a lazy afternoon in one of the pavillions. Absolute heaven!!
reviews.title: Loved It, I could have stayed longer if time allowed

description: The private beachfront and traditional Balinese thatched roof architecture, Puri Bagus Lovina offers 40 spacious villas including two suites with private pool and dining room. This beautiful resort provided plenty of space between each villa for stunning tropical gardens to enhance your privacy.
